mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_order (amount) values (#{aount}) where ono = #{ono}
INSERT INTO tbl_order (total) values (#{total}) where ono = #{ono}
mapper.update: update tbl_order set sold = 1, manager = {manager}, odate = sysdate WHERE customer = #{customer}
mapper.select: SELECT count(ono) FROM tbl_order where sold = 1 and TO_CHAR(odate,'yyyy-mm-dd') = TO_CHAR({xDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
SELECT sum(total) FROM tbl_order where sold = 1 and TO_CHAR(odate,'yyyy-mm-dd') = TO_CHAR({xDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
